sentences.caption: A small brown dog is sitting in front of a television, watching a show.
The image shows a plate of pasta with meatballs, broccoli, and cheese on a white tablecloth tablecloth.
The image shows a brown couch with green pillows and a remote control on the coffee table.
A white cat sits on a laptop, looking at the screen with its eyes.
The cat is laying on the sink in the bathroom.
A group of people are skateboarding down the sidewalk in front of a building.
The baby is sitting on the floor, holding a toothbrush in her mouth and looking up at the camera with a big smile on her face.

A wooden spade is laying on a cutting board with a knife of wood on it.
